about_me:

about_me:
I'm 33 years old and I'm half French and half German. I'm a native speaker of both languages, grew up in both countries, and have dual citizenship. 

My interest in American culture motivated me to start learning English by myself when I was a teenager. After a few years I reached a native speaker level and acquired a nearly perfect accent by having frequent conversations and constantly watching content in English.

Since then, language learning has become my main passion in life. My success wit
short_signature: Binational (FR/DE) polyglot and certified teacher. 8+ years of experience and 13 000 lessons taught.
teaching_style:
Be it in the context of informal or textbook based lessons, having meaningful conversations/interactions and listening/reading in the language as much as possible, like a child learning its native language, is a guarantee to success. This is the reason why my lessons and teaching style are based on this principle.

As your teacher I will guide you, motivate and encourage you to keep learning, and help you as much as I can in the learning process by making it as fun and engaging as possible.

about_me: Living between Syria and Turkey for 10 years taught me how language truly connects people. I specialize in Levantine Arabic (the dialect you’ll hear in shows, songs, and streets) and Modern Standard Arabic (MSA) for formal needs. Whether you want to chat naturally, understand slang, or ace work-related Arabic, I’ll tailor lessons to your pace—with patience and real-life practice. Let’s turn textbook words into confident conversations!
short_signature: Do you want to speak a better Arabic? Book a package and get an extra FREE lesson!
teaching_style:
Conversation Practice lessons with me are all about real, natural dialogue.
We’ll chat about everyday topics—like our lives, hobbies, and interests—while I gently correct your mistakes and introduce useful vocabulary along the way. The goal is to help you speak more naturally and confidently. I'm very patient and will always speak slowly and clearly to help you understand.
